name: Formene (polygonvariable)
description:
Formene is open world game in anime style. Explore the vast world, fly around, explore caves and other regions ! During gameplay the character can be changed that have different ability.

The game is currently in its early stage so bugs will be there and only one chunk of the map is currently released.

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D: Walk
  • 1/2: Switch Character
  • Esc: Quit
  • Space: Jump/ Fly
  • Tab: Fly Up
  • Caps Lock: Fly Down
  • Right Click: Increase Walk/ Fly Speed

Tested On:

  • RAM: 16 GB
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8 Graphics
  • Space Required: 1.1 GB

Install Instruction:

  • Extract the Formene.rar and
  • Run Formene.exe
  • Enjoy !!!
